thread.title: Shahid & Mira Look So In Love In These Pictures From His Birthday Party
thread.title_full: Shahid & Mira Look So In Love In These Pictures From His Birthday Party

author: Rashmi Daryanani
title: Shahid & Mira Look So In Love In These Pictures From His Birthday Party
text:
Rashmi Daryanani Feb . 20 . 2017 
Although Shahid Kapoor will be celebrating his 36th birthday on the 25th, Mira Kapoor threw a birthday party for him a week in advance. The two will be travelling with family on Shahid’s birthday, hence the early party – and, like we told you earlier, it was a “healthy” party. According to reports doing the rounds, the guests were served drinks and foods made from all of Shahid’s favourite superfoods, including beetroot, quinoa, kale, avocado and chia seeds. 
The happy couple stepped out at the beginning of the celebrations to pose for the media, and they made for a beautiful pair: Shahid Kapoor and Mira Kapoor Shahid Kapoor and Mira Kapoor Shahid Kapoor and Mira Kapoor Shahid Kapoor and Mira Kapoor Shahid Kapoor and Mira Kapoor Shahid Kapoor and Mira Kapoor ‹ ›
